trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Representa el contenido textual de los elementos gramaticales definidos por la [especificación de gramática de reconocimiento de voz (SRGS) versión 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/) de World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> clase representa el texto que se encuentra dentro de un conjunto de etiquetas de elemento SRGS.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objeto se construyó con un <xref:System.String> parámetro, un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> objeto se crea con su <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> propiedad inicializada en el valor de ese parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> , a continuación, se agrega el objeto a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> colección en la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class to modify the textual contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo de código de C# muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> clase para modificar el contenido textual de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The example changes the initial text values of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects (`Large`, `Larger`, and `Largest`) to `Small`, `Medium`, and `Large`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo cambia los valores de texto inicial de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos (`Large`, `Larger`, y `Largest`) a `Small`, `Medium`, y `Large`, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following shows how the modified text of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects would appear as `item` elements in the output XML grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Siguiente se muestra cómo modificar el texto de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos aparecería como `item` elementos en el archivo de gramática XML de salida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
trans-unit.target: Éste es el constructor predeterminado para la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> clase.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: El valor usado para establecer la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> de la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />, especificando el texto de la instancia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el texto contenido en la instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: El texto contenido en la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se ha intentado establecer <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> en <see langword="null" />.
